::Magmatron::

"Hell Beast I must speak you in private." Magmatron said. "If you accept I 
can give you something that will help you destroy Megatron. It is not a 
weapon, just information. All I ask for in return is that you secure the new 
Terrorsaur for me."
    He sent the message into Hell Beast's base. Now since he knew that 
Bobertron would betray him for "destroying" the Key to the Ark he needed to 
talk to Megatron.
    "Megatron, If you receive a message from Bobertron, please discard it. He 
is trying to become a power by lying to and destroying you. If you wish to 
listen to what he has to say then you may, but he is lying to get you and 
your Predacons destroyed. Please trust me"
